type.name: activity_method_documented_element_select
type.description: Enables the assignment of a document to an Activity_method.

entity.name: Activity_method
entity.description:
An Activity_method is a way and/or means to accomplish an activity's objectives.
This definition may be the basis for actions or the solution for action requests.

explicit.name: name
explicit.description: words by which the Activity_method is known.

explicit.name: consequence
explicit.description: the result (positive and/or negative) of this method.

explicit.name: purpose
explicit.description: an informal description of the reason for the Activity_method.
